reviewText: Got it due to my Daughter appearing in it...  no other reason... its ok for a student movie...

Nothing but a bunch of very short horror vignettes. None of this will make any sense to anyone, but I give it 3 stars for the enthusiasm the film makers have for this stuff.  I hear there is a feature that is at the moment unreleased and impossible to see.  It is supposed to make sense of all these things.  It would be nice to see it someday.

Shadow Falls plays on our fear of the unknown.  The road from happiness to frightened unhappiness is traveled, showing us the reactions of the involved characters, as well as their strengths and weaknesses.

Totally filled w/ pride for Mr. Sinn.  I have literally watched him grow up both physically and artistically.  Love his work and him.

BTW, I have some original ORIGINAL Sinn production materials if anyone wants to start the bidding!
